ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Surname
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I like it if it gets by the censors :) Anyway, I haunt this board in my role of Sage of Bards for the House of the Rising Phoenix guild in Cazic-Thule,
ygData.messageBody:
> I finally made 20th level yesterday. I was wondering if you have any ideas for a good
> surname. I figured ya'll had probably seen, or thought about it a lot more
> than I have. I was thinking of using Windsong. Suggestions?
> Skarsol
> Bard of the 20th song
> Cazic Thule

I like it if it gets by the censors :)
Anyway, I haunt this board in my role of "Sage" of Bards for the House
of the Rising Phoenix guild in Cazic-Thule, charged with helping Bards
where ever and when ever I find them. I have a synopsis of Hints,
stories, armor and weapons boiled down into a 30 page Word Doc and
useful Bardic links.

Give Moonflower Bllue ( a Chicago Blues singer with a voice that will
scrape the paint off a garbage truck)
an In Game "tell". Anyway I can help, I will :)

Bill
